Label: Unique Reference Number
London/Non-London
Group to compare
Number of pupils (FTE)
Description: Full time equivalent pupils

Label: Percentage of pupils eligible for Free School Meals (FSM)
Free school meals eligibility band
Grant funding (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes funds delegated by the LA, funding for 6th form students, SEN funding, funding for minority ethnic pupils, standards fund, other government grants, other grants and payments, SSG pupil focused, pupil focused extended school funding and/or grants and Additional grant for schools

Label: Self generated income (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes income from facilities and services, receipts from other insurance claims, income from contributions to visits etc, donations and/or private funds

Label: Total income (£ per pupil)
Description: Sum of grant funding and self generated income

Label: Teaching staff (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes all teachers' pay

Label: Supply Staff (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes salaries for supply staff employed directly by the school, agency staff and insurance costs

Label: Education support staff (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes salaries and wages of education support staff and insurance costs

Label: Premises (incl. Staff costs) (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes building and premises maintenance and improvement, cleaning and caretaking, water and sewerage services including security and hygiene and includes salaries for employees of the school

Label: Back office (incl. Staff costs) (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes administrative and clerical staff, administrative supplies and bought in professional services for administrative functions such as finances or legal

Label: Catering (incl. Staff costs) (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes spending on catering staff and catering supplies including providing free school meals and free milk

Label: Other staff costs (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes cost of other staff, indirect employess expenses, development and training, staff related insurance

Label: Energy (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes all costs related to fuel and energy

Label: Learning resources (not ICT equipment) (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes  books, classroom and learning equipment, school trips and payments to alternative provision services

Label: ICT learning resources (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes education software, cost of broadband, hire contracts and ICT revenue expenditure

Label: Bought in professional services - curriculum (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes spending on professional services to support the curriculum

Label: Other expenditure (£ per pupil)
Description: Includes rates, exam fees, other insurance premiums, revenue contributions to capital costs, special facilities such as swimming pools

Label: Total expenditure (£ per pupil)
Description: Sum of all expenditure categories
